website_summaries.verdict: A great budget set of handlebars for basic road bikes, children's bikes or renovation projects.
pros: Dropbar-style handlebars are light, cutting down the overall weight of the road bike
Handle surface provides plenty of space for accessories like bells and bike computers
cons: Does not fit all road bike brake and shift levers

customer_reviews.title: Nice ergo bar, not a classic maes bend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent handlebar for 20 bucks, but be aware that it is an ergo style bar, not a "maes" type bend as depicted in some of the illustrations. Update: Looks like the descriptions have been updated to show the differences in shape between the 25.4 bar and the 31.8 one. Much clearer now; the 25.4 is the classic curved shape while the 31.8 is the ergo shape.
customer_reviews.author: George C

customer_reviews.title: Bent on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Owned these for about a couple months. Until recently realized that the handlebars are bent and it keeps making me think my handlebars are crooked from my tire. I've never crashed or hit anything with the handlebars. Comfortable handlebars though and great value, just wouldn't recommend due to the bend. It was the left side drop that was bent outward about a half inch from center.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Light handle bars. A little on the narrow side for me though.
customer_reviews.text: This works well to convert my bike to drop bars. My only complaint is that there aren't enough choices for the width of the bars as these are about an inch too narrow, though they work flawlessly besides that. I cannot fault the product for that though since I knew what the measurements were before I ordered it, but for the money this was a great purchase. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Bar is off-center. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bar is off center. See pictures. Blue tape marks the approximate location of the diameter transition. One picture is with the bar aligned using the markings and the other picture is with it installed based on it's actual center. Using the markings in the "middle" of the bar, my handlebars were about 1cm off center. Did not notice until tape was on and trimmed. This is the only handlebar I've ever come across where this has been an issue. It's installed and fixed now, so im not going to worry about returning, but it still looks dumb and sloppy in an otherwise meticulous build. Would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: d.schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Well made, light & comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, light & comfortable. As an old school bike mechanic, For bars stems/ steerers & seatpost, I prefer aluminum over carbon fiber. Weight is comparable, cost a lot less. & my feeling is the “jury is still out” on carbon fiber durability & longevity. I know what to expect from aluminum. These bars are sculpted for riding comfort. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: GTP1601

customer_reviews.title: bar ends won't fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and the tubing seemed narrow to me. This was confirmed when I wrapped them and tried to fit my bar ends in. They didn't fit. Now have to try and find some bar ends that will fit and will probably wind up having to rewrap them. More money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Skipjack2001

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these handle bars to switch my straight bar hybrid, into my preference of a drop bar setup. So far? So Good! Sturdy, light and well made. Can’t go wrong for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joe F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good
customer_reviews.text: I wrapped them in some decent tape and they work flawlessly. Good angle for the 32mm - I would like to point out that review stating that the angle marks are off is accurate and thats why I dropped it a star. Little hard to line up properly with the thickness of the bar changing from one side to another. But they are sturdy and I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Matt the I.T. Guy

customer_reviews.title: The dimensions are misleading for the actual drop
customer_reviews.text: The dropdown bar size is perfect the fixie bikes in the middle where the stem holds the bar, however the drop handles are unnecessarily narrow! They are non standard None of the handlebar tape end caps fit into them, I even went to a bike shop and they say drop bars are never that narrow, it also made for a very uncomfortable ride after wrapping as the narrow bars are very hard to get a grip on. I had put it on a bike I was converting and doing summer work on, so I didn’t actually ride until after return window was over. Its just gonna be junk in the basement i guess
customer_reviews.author: Aakash Bansal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: The 31.8 are Argo bars. If that’s what you’re looking for these are perfect! The neutral grip position is perfect for climbing and the drops are nice and subtle so you can get down and pedals as hard as you can. Excellent product! Was exactly as advertised in the pics. Very light and feels, looks and performs amazing after wrapping them up in some tape. Only problem is that you can’t add brakes on the flats If you wanted to. ( unless you do something unconventional and flip your breaks upside down with the lever pointing in instead of out? )
customer_reviews.author: Ciprian Zaharia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for the long ride.
customer_reviews.text: I got too used to my road bikes. My mountain bikes handlebars rusted and snapped off while riding (not fun at all)... I put this on it instead of a straight bar. Improved speed, but lost the mountain bike appeal (who bunny hops with drop bars?). Anyway, they are a well priced sturdy set of bars.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Harper

customer_reviews.title: Light but with sacrifice to sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: light weight but feels kinda flimsy. It does the job on my casual bike. It looks good but it can use some more sturdiness
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bar
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy handlebar for the price. It’s what I currently have on my bike and not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Great for city commuters
customer_reviews.text: These drop down handlebars are great for city commuters. The shape of them allows you to keep your body relatively narrow and easily weave between cars on the road. Very happy with the purchase. All you need is to add some hand breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lax

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I've been riding bikes with straight bars my entire life, so switching to the drop bars took some getting used to. Very different feel, but I like it. Just wish it was a wider, though.
customer_reviews.author: Castor Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Just as described. Sturdy aluminum bars with true measurement specs.
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped the black paint would be a little more durable. There were a lot of scratches revealing the silver aluminum after the install. Granted, it will mostly be covered by bar tape. All in all, a good product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anon E. Muss

customer_reviews.title: They bend and flex. Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not study at all. The handlebars flex and bend while riding on one side. I'm not sure if they're defective or just not good quality. But poor quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: Boosh

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. The handlebars finished off my bicycle project. Very happy with the price point and quality
customer_reviews.author: Tony Belmont

customer_reviews.title: First impressions it's a good price for a reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Had some work done on my bicycle recently was directed by my local bike shop to purchase this brand of handle bar. First impressions it's a good price for a reliable product. Fits well and is good size and shape for me. Arrived within the week of purchase and having been installed onto my bicycle I am very satisfied with the product since.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Mannetti

customer_reviews.title: Economical drop road bar.
customer_reviews.text: Good lightweight drop bars, nice anodizing. Not compatible with bar end shifters (ID too small).
customer_reviews.author: Karin Conover-Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not For Modern Road Bike Controls!
customer_reviews.text: Not sized right for modern road bike levers and controls! Could not use them due to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1324576809

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: They are very light and work well with my Shimano 105 shifters. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time I haven't drive my bike,but exactly what I was expecting, the only down side I am having problems to find the right shifter that will fit on the bar. Seller should advertise or offer the silhifter too.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus N

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Super easy to install and they look very nice. Installed on Nishiki Manitoba Hybrid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and lightweight. The metal isnt easily scratched. The 25 mm fit my 70s schwinn perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than expected but looks and feels great none the less!
customer_reviews.author: Knots Captain

customer_reviews.title: Great drop bars!
customer_reviews.text: Great bars I absolutely love them nothing wrong with them yet and make sure the size match’s up with your stem
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and comfortable to use, i change my bike handlbar by this one it's make your drive soft.
customer_reviews.author: abdulwahed mohammed al-abdullatif

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not a large size and the hooks are weird it's not what the photo seems
customer_reviews.text: It looks different in the photo to be honest. It's really smaller type of handlebar for a small bike.
customer_reviews.author: Evan
